name: Middle Finger
description:
A short, story-based first-person shooter about the future of warfare.

Once, generals sent soldiers from trenches into battle. These days, the soldiers sit behind screens and command robotic infantry. They hold not guns, but joysticks.

You are one such soldier. Welcome to the future, private.

I made Middle Finger for #ResistJam. I had plans for a larger game, but was short on time and had to settle for this little demo. You can follow future development on my Twitter.
